message: Let's split it evenly to start!
You started high, now it's time to make a counteroffer!
You're getting closer, but I'm still not there yet!
I'm not budging, meet me in the middle!
I'm willing to compromise, but not that much!
I'm not giving up, I want more!
I'm still not convinced, let's try again!
You're getting desperate, I'm not backing down!
Let's meet in the middle, finally!
